doubleUploads.name: Ask before double uploads
doubleUploads.description: If you activate this option and click the "Upload" button for an already uploaded screenshot, you'll be prompted to confirm whether you want to upload the screenshot again.

openRegisterPage.name: Register on imageserver
openRegisterPage.description: Signup and grab your AUTH Key on https://imageserver.pw/dashboard

token.name: AUTH Key
token.description: You can find your AUTH Key here: https://imageserver.pw/dashboard

register.name: ยง7In order to use this addon, you need to register and copy your AUTH Key.

token.name: ยง7You can find your AUTH Key on your Account dashboard

messages.upload: To upload the screenshot, simply click here and send it off to imageserver.pw!

errors.title: An error ocurred!
errors.empty: We encountered an issue. Please verify your AUTH Key.
errors.noToken: Oh snap! Make sure to pop your AUTH Key into the addon config, like milk into your morning cereal.
